item.title: 种子公司 Corteva 因作物困境利润前景黯淡而暴跌
item.description: 由于南美地区的种植困境，种子生产商 Corteva 公司下调了盈利展望，该公司股价创下近一年来的最大跌幅。【原文：Shares of Corteva Inc. tumbled the most in almost a year after the seed producer lowered its earnings outlook amid planting woes in South America.】

item.title: 成本更低的进口产品增加，英国塑料回收站将关闭
item.description: 投资公司 KKR & Co.旗下的废物管理公司 Viridor Ltd.计划关闭英国的一家回收工厂，原因是缺乏政府支持以及对回收塑料的需求减少。【原文：Viridor Ltd., a waste-management company owned by investment firm KKR & Co., plans to close a recycling plant in the UK due to lack of government support and lower demand for recycled plastic.】

item.title: 匈牙利炼油商莫尔公司在俄罗斯石油交易后现金流强劲
item.description: 匈牙利能源公司 Mol Nyrt.在调整了通过乌克兰输油管道购买俄罗斯原油的交易后，预计即使在欧洲炼油商面临严峻环境的情况下也能获得正现金流。【原文：Hungarian energy company Mol Nyrt. expects positive cash flow even in a tough environment for European refiners, after adjusting a deal for Russian crude via pipeline through Ukraine.】

item.title: Kelp Blue 计划发行非洲首只企业蓝色债券
item.description: Kelp Blue 计划明年发行非洲首只企业蓝色债券，以扩大纳米比亚沿海的巨型海藻林。【原文：Kelp Blue plans to issue Africa’s first corporate blue bond next year to expand its giant kelp forests along Namibia’s coast.】

item.title: 英国央行称冲击金边债券市场的交易平仓可能已经结束
item.description: 英格兰银行官员表示，上周预算案公布后英国债券的大跌因投资者的定位而加剧，这是一个信号，表明他们认为最糟糕的下滑已经过去。【原文：Bank of England officials said the UK bond selloff that followed last week’s budget announcement was exacerbated by investor positioning, a signal they believe the worst of the slide is over.】

item.title: 如果退市，AI-达令超微将面临 17 亿美元的债券账单
item.description: 如果超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc）的会计问题导致其被纳斯达克证券交易所除名，那么该公司可能面临提前偿还高达 17.25 亿美元的债券。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. could face an early repayment on up to $1.725 billion of its bonds should its accounting woes result in it being booted off the Nasdaq stock exchange.】

item.title: 捷克降息，特朗普胜选加剧经济增长和政策风险
item.description: 捷克决策者连续第八次下调利率，原因是疲软的经济增长使人们对通胀风险的担忧黯然失色。【原文：Czech policymakers delivered an eighth consecutive interest-rate cut as weak economic growth eclipsed concerns about inflationary risks.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选后欧洲首次债务销售需求强劲
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国大选后，欧洲债务市场重新活跃起来，三笔交易的订单量超过了其总规模的三倍。【原文：Investors are jumping back in Europe’s debt market, with a trio of deals amassing orders for more than three times their combined size as activity resumes following Donald Trump’s US election win.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行和德意志银行将保留 FNZ 的部分贷款
item.description: 包括巴克莱银行（Barclays）和德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）在内的银行不得不保留金融技术公司 FNZ Group Ltd 21 亿美元再融资交易中的一部分，因为它们未能吸引到足够的兴趣将整笔贷款出售给投资者。【原文：Banks including Barclays and Deutsche Bank are having to hold onto a chunk of financial technology firm FNZ Group Ltd’s $2.1 billion refinancing deal after failing to drum up enough interest to sell the whole loan onto investors.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长诺特对欧元区经济前景持乐观态度
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员克拉斯-克诺（Klaas Knot）表示，随着通胀放缓和借贷成本下降，他对该地区的经济前景持乐观态度。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Klaas Knot said he’s upbeat on the prospects for the region’s economy as inflation moderates and borrowing costs fall.】

item.description:

item.title: 土耳其官员检查当地银行的海外流动性交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，土耳其官员一直在仔细审查当地贷款机构进行的类似回购的交易，这些交易允许贷款机构在国外获得更便宜的里拉资金，而且可能会夸大外资流入的官方数据。【原文：Turkish officials have been scrutinizing repo-like transactions by local lenders that allow them to access cheaper lira funding abroad and which may be inflating official data on foreign inflows, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 舒尔茨分裂联盟的瓦解提振德国股市
item.description: 在德国不受欢迎的联合政府开始解体后，德国股市周四大幅飙升，引发了人们对明年提前选举将带来急需的经济提振的希望。【原文：German stocks leapt on Thursday after the country’s unpopular coalition government started to unravel, sparking hopes that early elections next year will bring a much needed economic boost.】

item.title: Evercore 称美股牛市才刚刚开始
item.description: Evercore ISI 的策略师认为，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）削减繁文缛节的计划将推动美国 500 指数（S&P 500 Index）到明年年中再上涨 11%。【原文：The US stocks rally is nowhere near done, according to Evercore ISI strategists, who see Donald Trump’s plans to slice through red tape propelling the S&P 500 Index another 11% through the middle of next year.】

item.title: CommScope 未能达成债务协议，盘前股价暴跌
item.description: CommScope Holding Co. 在继续与其他投资者商谈债券再融资事宜时，未能与一组债权人达成协议。在这家电信基础设施公司业绩未达预期后，其股价在纽约股市盘前交易中最高下跌了 47%。【原文：CommScope Holding Co. has failed to reach an agreement with a group of its creditors as it continues to talk with other investors to refinance its bonds. Shares dropped as much as 47% in premarket trading in New York after the telecommunications infrastructure company missed estimates.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟在国际市场上推动流媒体用户数量增长
item.description: Max 流媒体服务的母公司华纳兄弟发现公司在第三季度获得了比预期更多的用户，这得益于其国际扩张，并表明其在线业务正在回暖。【原文：Warner Bros. Discovery Inc., the parent of the Max streaming service, gained more subscribers than expected in the third quarter, boosted by its international expansion and suggesting its online business is picking up.】

item.title: 德国迫在眉睫的即兴投票给能源目标带来冲击
item.description: 高昂的能源成本和向清洁燃料过渡的不确定性是近年来德国工业巨头外流的主要原因。执政联盟的突然解散和迫在眉睫的大选将使问题更加难以解决。【原文：High energy costs and an uncertain transition to cleaner fuels have been a key driver behind Germany’s exodus of industrial giants in recent years. The ruling coalition’s sudden dissolution and looming snap election will make the problem even harder to fix.】

item.title: 特朗普与马斯克的合作为 X 的价值注入新元素
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克 440 亿美元收购 Twitter 的交易似乎突然变得便宜了，但首先...【原文：Elon Musk’s $44 billion Twitter deal suddenly seems cheap, but first...】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会开始调查桑坦德银行使用信息平台的情况
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）称，美国证券交易委员会已开始调查其美国市场部门使用未经批准的信息平台的情况。【原文：Banco Santander SA said the Securities and Exchange Commission has started an inquiry into the use of unapproved messaging platforms at its US markets unit.】

item.title: 英国央行降息并警告预算案的通胀影响
item.description: 英国央行今年第二次下调借贷成本，但并未发出加快宽松的信号，而是警告说，预算可能会使通胀率上升多达半个百分点。【原文：The Bank of England cut borrowing costs for the second time this year, but stopped short of signaling faster easing, warning that the budget could drive up inflation by as much as half a percentage point.】

item.title: 在低迷的大型科技公司财报季，英伟达显然是赢家
item.description: 在本财报季，科技巨头们的业绩大多不尽如人意，但对于英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Results from tech giants largely underwhelmed this earnings season — but they included plenty of good news for Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 流动性减少，尼日利亚奈拉兑美元汇率再创新低
item.description: 创纪录高位的固定收入收益率和央行干预未能阻止奈拉的下滑，尼日利亚货币本周创下了历史新低。【原文：Record-high fixed-income yields and central bank intervention have failed to stem the naira’s slide, with the Nigerian currency hitting a fresh record low this week.】

item.title: 美联储和债券守夜人在特朗普新时代占据中心位置
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选的一个直接影响是：华尔街的经济学家们现在认为，考虑到特朗普政策可能带来的通胀效应，美联储决策者会将利率维持在较高水平。【原文：One immediate effect from Donald Trump’s election victory: Wall Street economists now see Fed policymakers keeping interest rates higher than they otherwise would have, given the likely inflationary effect of his policies.】

item.title: 在加密货币押注特朗普之后，法国监管机构对 Polymarket 进行了审查
item.description: 在美国总统大选前后用户需求激增之后，法国博彩监管机构正在检查基于加密货币的预测市场平台 Polymarket 的运营情况，以确定其是否符合当地规则。【原文：France’s gambling regulator is examining the operations of cryptocurrency-based prediction markets platform Polymarket to see if it complies with local rules following a surge in user demand around the US presidential election.】

item.title: 即使股东退出收购的收益放缓，凯雷仍提高了利润率
item.description: 凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group Inc.首席执行官哈维-施瓦茨（Harvey Schwartz）在第三季度提高了利润率和收费收益，但该公司股东从交易退出中获得的利润仍然微薄。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. Chief Executive Harvey Schwartz made progress lifting margins and earnings on fees in the third quarter, a period when shareholder profits from deal exits remained muted for the firm.】

item.title: 权衡价格压力，塞尔维亚维持利率不变
item.description: 塞尔维亚中央银行维持借贷成本不变，这一出人意料的举动表明决策者在权衡挥之不去的价格压力时持谨慎态度。【原文：Serbia’s central bank kept borrowing costs on hold, an unexpected move that signaled caution as policymakers weigh lingering price pressures.】

item.title: 瑞典将为电池研究和被解雇工人提供新支持
item.description: 瑞典政府承诺为研究提供新资金，并推动保留被 Northvolt AB 裁减的工人的技能，以此支持该国新兴的电池行业。【原文：The government of Sweden has promised to support the country’s fledgling battery industry with new funds for research and a push to retain the skills of workers made redundant by Northvolt AB.】

item.title: 印度最高法院下令对破产的捷特航空公司进行清算
item.description: 印度最高法院周四裁定，曾经是印度第二大航空公司的捷特航空公司（Jet Airways）将被清算，从而结束了这家破产航空公司长达五年的破产清算传奇。【原文：Jet Airways, once India‘s second-biggest carrier, is to be liquidated, the country’s Supreme Court ruled Thursday, ending a tumultuous five-year insolvency resolution saga for the bankrupt airline.】

item.title: 津巴布韦中央银行将放松货币管制并允许 ZiG 自由流通
item.description: 津巴布韦央行副行长表示，津巴布韦希望其黄金支持的货币能在外汇市场上自由浮动，但他拒绝透露具体时间。【原文：Zimbabwe wants its gold-backed currency to float freely on the foreign exchange market, the central bank’s deputy governor said, though he declined to spell out when this would happen.】
